title: Shavel Home Products Micro Flannel Printed Sheet Set, Full Size, Colorful Deer
features: The Perfect Fit: Set includes: flat sheet, fitted sheet, pillowcase(s): twin & twin xl sets include one standard pillowcase; full & queen set includes two standard pillowcases; king set includes two king pillowcases
Anti-Shrink & Anti-Pill: Designed to never fade, shrink, or pill, micro flannel fabric stays smooth, soft, and the right size; bring sheets directly from the dryer to your bed with no hassle
Machine Washable: Crafted from double-brushed, smooth, and wrinkle-free polyester, our sheet sets are constructed to wash and dry quickly, saving you time and energy - always a perfect fit and finish
Your Bedding Needs: Discover the full, line of shavel home products including sheets, blankets, comforters, coverlets, throws, fitted quilts, electric blankets and mattress pads
Micro Flannel is an innovative fabric that combines top comfort features of high-quality European flannel with the easy-care qualities of 100% polyester fleece.
description: Micro Flannel Shavel Printed Sheet Set is Printedly soft and warm. This set includes 1 fitted sheet, 1 flat sheet, & 2 Pillowcase. Micro Flannel is an innovation that combines the best comfort features of high quality European cotton flannel with the easy care of fleece-and all without bulk or heavy weight. Micro flannel sheet sets combines the best comfort properties of cotton flannel with the easy care and energy saving qualities of fleece. Micro Flannel does not shrink, is anti-pill, resists wrinkling, and fits deep pocket mattresses. Micro Flannel is energy saving because it is fast wash and quick dry. Its thermal design keeps you warm and cozy. Made from 100% Polyester so pre-washed and preshrunk with softener for an extra-soft feel. Available color is Colorful Deer. Availabe size is Full. Dimension is Flat Sheet (86" x 100"); Fitted Sheet (75" x 54" x 16"); 2 Pillowcase (21" x 32"). Care instruction: Easy care.
